name: foodsoft-shop
description: Shopping cart component for Foodsoft: web-based software to manage a non-profit food coop.

scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production webpack -p && mkdir -p build/css && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css node_modules/flag-icon-css/css/flag-icon.min.css build/css/ && cp -R node_modules/flag-icon-css/flags build/ && sed 's/node_modules[^"]*\/\([^"]*\)"/css\/\1"/' index.html > build/index.html

author: wvengen <dev-voko@willem.engen.nl>
